Create a blog with Quarto OR the things I whish I knew before I started blogging

A step by step guide to create your blog with quart and why you should be using it for blogging

blogging
Author

Sebastiano Ferraris

Published

October 30, 2022

  • Pre-requisites
  • Why another blog?

  • Create your thematic blog posts
  • Create your about page
  • Create your CV
  • Finally, publish your work
  • Appendix: write mathematical formulas
  • Appendix: my workflow with Quarto and how it improved over Medium and Hashnode
  • Appendix: what else you can do with quarto

A couple of months ago I transitioned my newly clreated blog from medium to Hashnode and I thought there was no better option!

Then, after talking about some issues in LaTeX formatting and jupyter notebook conversion to markdown with Maxime Labonne (also documented here), Maxime suggested me to give quarto a try.

In this post you will find some tips about how to create your blog with quarto and why of the three options that I have tried so far, quarto is by far the best one.

Credits and further resources

  • Bea Milz
  • Albert Rapp
  • Learn enough git to be dangerous by Michael Hartl
  • Learn enough command line to be dangerous by Michael Hartl
  • Quarto guide and documentation
  • Maxime Labonne
  • Learn \(\LaTeX\) in 30 minutes

Pre-requisites

Unlike with medium where it is not needed, and with hashnode where you can not know, it is not possible to start a blog with quarto without any familiarity with command line and git.

If you are here and are new to you then it may be too early to start using with quarto.

If you have any

My favourite learning resources, and the one I recommend most often to friends, family and students are from the Learn enough series, - Learn enough git to be dangerous and Learn enough command line to be dangerous.
